content:
Grunhut family

1 Leizer GRUNHUT                     1777 - 1847 #762 (Itzik+Reisli)  {census family 21}
 + Mariam REISAPFEL                  1779 - ?1831 #209 (Man)
  2o Kayla GRUNHUT                   1804
    * Wolf SPANLANG                  1803
          married Jan 29, 1824 #6
        FAMILY LISTING
  2o Sara GRUNHUT                    Apr 7, 1806 Krakow - 1848 #28
    * Jozef KURTZ                    1795-1801 - 1847 #557
        FAMILY LISTING
  2o unnamed GRUNHUT                 Sep 26, 1808 Krakow - Sep 26, 1808 Krakow
  2o Laia GRUNHUT                    1810-11 - after 1870
    * Chaim Hirsch TORBE             1811 #74a - Aug 23, 1881 #407
          married Feb 7, 1834 #11
        FAMILY LISTING
  2x Izaak Aron GRUNHUT              1812 #143 - 1849 #43
    + Chai ROSENFELD                 1817 #50
          married May 27, 1834 #45
     3x Samuel Majer GRUNHUT         1836 #135
       + Ana WEINREB                 1834-35
             married May 28, 1855 #151
     3x Jozef Mendel GRUNHUT         Jul 3, 1840 #312
       + Sara BERMAN                 Apr 6, 1841 Krakow
             married Mar 27, 1864 #17
        4x Isaak Aron GRUNHUT        May 7, 1864 #918
        4o Liebe GRUNHUT             Sep 3, 1865 (1866 #387)
        4o Lea (Eleonora) GRUNHUT    Mar 8, 1867 #330
          * Izak Mojzesz BRANDSTATTER  1858 Brzesko
                married Mar 12, 1889 #33
        4x Meier GRUNHUT             1869 #713
        4x Berl GRUNHUT              Jan 19, 1873 #48
          + Chaja (Helena) GRUNWALD  Oct 15, 1876 #856 - after 1935
                married Apr 27, 1899 #52
           5x Jozef GRUNHUT          Feb 8, 1900 #66 - after 1946
             + Janina EHRENPREIS     May 26, 1903 #318
                   married Prog.Syn 1926 #776
     3o Marya GRUNHUT                1842 #387
       * Jakob BOBER                 Sep 28, 1836/ Aug 10, 1840 Nowy Sacz
             married Feb 4, 1862 #4
        4x Izak Aron BOBER           Jan 19, 1863 #28
          + Rosa MOZES               Jun 12, 1880 Wieden
                banns Prog.Syn 1899 #48
        4x Josef BOBER               Feb 25, 1866 #209
          + Rozia SAMUELY            1877 #158 Rzeszow
                banns Prog.Syn 1899 #29,  married 1899 #121 Lwow
        4o Mindel BOBER              Jan 10, 1869 #48
          * Juliusz MANDEL
                married Nov 9, 1889 Bielsko
           5x Jozef Otto MANDEL      Jan 9, 1891 #5
        4x Dawid BOBER               1870 #452 - Sep 7, 1873 #794
        4o Golde Rachel BOBER        May 13, 1872 #296
        4x Nachum BOBER              Jun 25, 1881 #353 - Jun 1, 1882 #219
     3x Hirsz Dawid GRUNHUT          Nov 30, 1844 #569 - 1913 Krakow
       + Rifka Lai LERNER            Oct 24, 1847 #409
             married May 26, 1874 #23a
        4o Golda Rachel GRUNHUT      Jun 6, 1878 #359
          * Szymon MESTER            1870 Tarnow
                married Oct 18, 1896 #134
           5x Adolf Jakob MESTER     Feb 7, 1899 #94
     3x Kalman GRUNHUT               Apr 26, 1847 #160 - 1847 #277
